channel.title: CVE Feed for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon

item.title: CVE-2023-28578|2024-08-29T18:23:28.510Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption in Core Services while executing the command for removing a single event listener.

item.title: CVE-2023-33104|2024-08-29T18:23:54.358Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Transient DOS while processing PDU Release command with a parameter PDU ID out of range.

item.title: CVE-2023-33115|2024-08-23T18:52:39.896Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption while processing buffer initialization, when trusted report for certain report types are generated.

item.title: CVE-2024-21471|2024-08-15T16:01:02.923Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption when IOMMU unmap of a GPU buffer fails in Linux.

item.title: CVE-2024-23382|2024-08-15T03:55:45.836Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption while processing graphics kernel driver request to create DMA fence.

item.title: CVE-2024-21481|2024-08-15T03:55:39.689Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption when preparing a shared memory notification for a memparcel in Resource Manager.

item.title: CVE-2024-23381|2024-08-15T03:55:44.404Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption when memory mapped in a VBO is not unmapped by the GPU SMMU.

item.title: CVE-2024-23355|2024-08-15T03:55:41.211Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption when keymaster operation imports a shared key.

item.description: Memory corruption during session sign renewal request calls in HLOS.

item.title: CVE-2024-23383|2024-08-15T03:55:47.138Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption when kernel driver attempts to trigger hardware fences.

item.title: CVE-2024-21472|2024-08-12T18:19:40.248Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption in Kernel while handling GPU operations.

item.title: CVE-2023-33096|2024-08-12T18:20:49.915Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Transient DOS while processing DL NAS Transport message, as specified in 3GPP 24.501 v16.

item.title: CVE-2023-43539|2024-08-12T18:20:32.754Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Transient DOS while processing an improperly formatted 802.11az Fine Time Measurement protocol frame.

item.title: CVE-2023-43541|2024-08-12T18:20:17.854Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption while invoking the SubmitCommands call on Gfx engine during the graphics render.

item.title: CVE-2024-21470|2024-08-12T18:19:48.762Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption while allocating memory for graphics.

item.title: CVE-2023-43549|2024-08-12T18:20:07.549Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption while processing TPC target power table in FTM TPC.

item.title: CVE-2023-33084|2024-08-12T18:20:59.700Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Transient DOS while processing IE fragments from server during DTLS handshake.

item.title: CVE-2024-23352|2024-08-05T14:21:19.675Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Transient DOS when NAS receives ODAC criteria of length 1 and type 1 in registration accept OTA.

item.title: CVE-2024-33014|2024-08-05T14:21:35.794Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Transient DOS while parsing ESP IE from beacon/probe response frame.

item.title: CVE-2024-23384|2024-08-05T14:21:29.441Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption when the mapped pages in VBO are still mapped after reclaiming by shrinker.

item.title: CVE-2024-21481|2024-08-05T14:21:17.518Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption when preparing a shared memory notification for a memparcel in Resource Manager.

item.title: CVE-2024-33022|2024-08-05T14:43:56.607Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption while allocating memory in HGSL driver.

item.title: CVE-2024-33020|2024-08-05T14:47:53.939Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Transient DOS while processing TID-to-link mapping IE elements.

item.title: CVE-2024-33015|2024-08-05T14:21:37.096Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Transient DOS while parsing SCAN RNR IE when bytes received from AP is such that the size of the last param of IE is less than neighbor report.

item.title: CVE-2024-23357|2024-08-05T14:21:25.013Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Transient DOS while importing a PKCS#8-encoded RSA key with zero bytes modulus.

item.title: CVE-2024-33028|2024-08-05T14:37:12.190Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption as fence object may still be accessed in timeline destruct after isync fence is released.

item.title: CVE-2024-33011|2024-08-05T14:21:31.845Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Transient DOS while parsing the MBSSID IE from the beacons, when the MBSSID IE length is zero.

item.title: CVE-2024-23356|2024-08-05T14:21:23.701Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption during session sign renewal request calls in HLOS.

item.title: CVE-2024-33025|2024-08-05T14:21:45.607Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Transient DOS while parsing the BSS parameter change count or MLD capabilities fields of the ML IE.

item.title: CVE-2024-33010|2024-08-05T14:21:30.704Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Transient DOS while parsing fragments of MBSSID IE from beacon frame.

item.title: CVE-2024-33019|2024-08-05T14:21:39.275Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Transient DOS while parsing the received TID-to-link mapping action frame.

item.title: CVE-2024-33034|2024-08-05T14:37:43.199Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption can occur if VBOs hold outdated or invalid GPU SMMU mappings, especially when the binding and reclaiming of memory buffers are performed at the same time.

item.title: CVE-2024-33024|2024-08-05T14:21:44.499Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Transient DOS while parsing the ML IE when a beacon with length field inside the common info of ML IE greater than the ML IE length.

item.title: CVE-2024-33027|2024-08-05T14:39:13.023Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption can occur when arbitrary user-space app gains kernel level privilege to modify DDR memory by corrupting the GPU page table.

item.title: CVE-2024-33021|2024-08-05T14:45:22.446Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption while processing IOCTL call to set metainfo.

item.title: CVE-2024-23383|2024-08-05T14:21:28.410Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption when kernel driver attempts to trigger hardware fences.

item.description: Transient DOS during music playback of ALAC content.

item.title: CVE-2024-33013|2024-08-05T14:21:34.386Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Transient DOS when driver accesses the ML IE memory and offset value is incremented beyond ML IE length.

item.title: CVE-2024-33026|2024-08-05T14:21:46.685Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Transient DOS while parsing probe response and assoc response frame when received frame length is less than max size of timestamp.

item.description: Memory corruption when memory mapped in a VBO is not unmapped by the GPU SMMU.

item.description: Information disclosure while handling beacon or probe response frame in STA.

item.title: CVE-2024-23382|2024-08-05T14:21:27.359Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption while processing graphics kernel driver request to create DMA fence.

item.title: CVE-2024-33012|2024-08-05T14:21:33.219Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Transient DOS while parsing the multiple MBSSID IEs from the beacon, when the tag length is non-zero value but with end of beacon.

item.title: CVE-2024-23355|2024-08-05T14:21:22.396Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption when keymaster operation imports a shared key.

item.description: Information disclosure while handling beacon probe frame during scan entry generation in client side.

item.title: CVE-2024-33018|2024-08-05T14:21:38.166Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Transient DOS while parsing the received TID-to-link mapping element of the TID-to-link mapping action frame.

item.title: CVE-2024-33023|2024-08-05T14:42:39.778Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption while creating a fence to wait on timeline events, and simultaneously signal timeline events.

item.description: Permanent DOS when DL NAS transport receives multiple payloads such that one payload contains SOR container whose integrity check has failed, and the other is LPP where UE needs to send status message to network.

item.description: Transient DOS while decoding attach reject message received by UE, when IEI is set to ESM_IEI.

item.description: Memory corruption while processing TPC target power table in FTM TPC.

item.description: Memory corruption while verifying the serialized header when the key pairs are generated.

item.description: Memory corruption in Audio during a playback or a recording due to race condition between allocation and deallocation of graph object.

item.description: Memory corruption when multiple listeners are being registered with the same file descriptor.

item.description: Memory corruption while parsing beacon/probe response frame when AP sends more supported links in MLIE.
